r.s: Abstracts parsing and rendering rules for Wiki markup in structured plain text.
r.d: Abstracts parsing and rendering rules for Wiki markup in structured plain text.
r.n: * Completely changed directory structure to PEAR standard (thanks to Matthias Nothhaft for pointing out my dumb mistake there) * Due to the directory change, you should include/require 'Text/Wiki.php' (vice 'Text_Wiki.php') * Added separate parse() and render() methods (transform() now calls theses instead of parsing and rendering within the transform() method) * Added getSource() to get the parsed source text * Added getTokens() to get the parsed tokens (or tokens from specific rules)
